name: DOOORS 4 - room escape game
description:
This is the fourth chapter in the "DOOORS" series, the stage clear-type escape game.
The purpose of this game is to break out of the rooms.
Solve the hidden mysteries by making full use of iPhone gestures,
such as shake or multi-touch, and complete all the stages.
● Game Features
- Mini escape games that are perfect to kill your free time
- Simple and stunning graphics
- Auto-save
